name: Flow
long_description: Flow is building products to improve your browsing experience. The web browser is an indispensable part of our daily lives - we use it for work, shopping, entertainment, research, sharing memes, procrastinating, connecting with friends and family. Yet it remains tough to be organized and intentful when using it. Weâ€™re building products to dramatically improve your browsing experience, and Flow is our foray into intentful browsing.
one_liner: Improve your browsing experience by staying organized and intentful
